#### Get familiar with our released products
Veteran facing:
- [ ] Take a look at our main landing page on VA.gov - [Get help from a VA accredited representative or VSO](https://www.va.gov/get-help-from-accredited-representative/) - review the content and check out the links on the page. The following link-outs on the page are our Veteran-facing products:
   - [ ] FAQ page - review the content
   - [ ] Find a Representative - use the tool to find a representative in your area
   - [ ] Appoint a Representative - walk through the experience to appoint the representative you just located with Find a Rep. Note: this will be the unauthenticated experience that ends in PDF Generation
- [ ] Sign into `staging.va.gov` with a [test user](https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/va.gov-team-sensitive/blob/master/Administrative/vagov-users/staging-test-accounts-accredited-representation-management-poa.csv) using the ID.me method and 
   - [ ] Locate the Representative Status in Profile page
   - [ ] Head back to our [landing page](https://www.va.gov/get-help-from-accredited-representative/) (quick link in the VA.gov footer) and Find a Rep and view the Rep Status widget in it's authenticated state 
   - [ ] Use Appoint a Rep to appoint the representative `Paul Spedaliere` and submit the request **online** (you need to indicate you're the Veteran in the first step)
 
Representative facing:
- [ ] Sign into `staging.va.gov/representative` with the vets.gov.user+0@gmail.com [test user](https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/va.gov-team-sensitive/blob/master/Administrative/vagov-users/mvi-staging-users.csv) 
- [ ] View the Representation Requests page and accept the request you just submitted for `Paul Spedaliere` 


#### Review UX resources
- [ ] Review [VA.gov Platform Research & Design Guidelines](https://depo-platform-documentation.scrollhelp.site/research-design/)

- [ ] Review the [Collaboration Cycle Guidelines](https://depo-platform-documentation.scrollhelp.site/research-design/#Researchanddesign-PlatformCollaborationCycle)

- [ ] Review [ARC UX Design Ops Wiki](https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/accredited-representative-crew/wiki/ARC-UX-Design-Ops)

- [ ] Review [ARC Figma design files](https://www.figma.com/files/1499394822283304153/project/176208173)

- [ ] Review [ARC GH Research - ARF](https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/va.gov-team/tree/master/products/accredited-representative-facing/research)

- [ ] Review [ARC GH Research - ARM](https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/va.gov-team/tree/master/products/accredited-representation-management/research)
